column3: Latest;Svay Rieng: Police from the Immigration Department in collaboration with the Svay Rieng Provincial Police on the night of August 21
column4: 2019 inspected and detained over 350 Chinese nationals staying in an eight-story building  located in Bavet Kandal village
column6: Svay Rieng province.------Twenty-seven Chinese nationals  had no legal documents
column7: and were also on a wanted list in China.------The Chinese nationals with warrants were detained and sent to the Immigration Department for questioning and follow-up procedures. A total of 339 Chinese nationals whose names were not included on the Chinese authoritiesâ€™ list were allowed one week to produce the correct documents to allow them to work legally.------Swift News
